headline: Tesla Announces New Semi Truck Trim Levels, Elon Musk Reaffirms Volume Production This Year
summary: Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA) has announced updates to the company's Semi truck, with CEO Elon Musk confirming that the EV giant would scale production this year. Tesla Semi Trims The automaker, on its official website on Sunday, shared that the Semi would be available in two trim levels: Standard and Long Range. The Standard trim gets up to 325 miles of range with an energy consumption of 1.7 kWh per mile and a gross combination weight of 82,000 lbs. The Long Range trim features similar specs, but h
